verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* shewed \w me|strong="H6440"\w* Jesus \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w adversary|strong="H7854"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* thee: \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H2088"\w* \w brand|strong="H0181"\w* \w plucked|strong="H5337"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*?

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* Jesus \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w filthy|strong="H6674"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0559"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w filthy|strong="H6674"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* thy \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* thee \w with|strong="H0413"\w* change \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Put|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* mitre \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* mitre \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* protested \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Jesus, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Beep \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*, thou \w also|strong="H1571"\w* shalt \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* courts, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w some|strong="H0428"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w now|strong="H1571"\w* \w present|strong="H5975"\w* \w here|strong="H3541"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* thee.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* Jesus thou \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w then|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w friends|strong="H7453"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* portending \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w WILL|strong="H0376"\w* \w BRING|strong="H0935"\w* \w MY|strong="H8085"\w* \w SERVANT|strong="H5650"\w* \w THE|strong="H0853"\w* ORIENT.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Jesus: \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* grave \w the|strong="H0853"\w* graving thereof, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H4185"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shell \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*.
